headline: Strong Momentum in Block (XYZ)’s Square and Cash App Segments Drives UBS’ Bullish Stance
summary: Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) is one of the 15 best AI stocks to watch in December 2025. On December 3, 2025, UBS analyst Timothy Chiodo reiterated his “Buy” rating on Block, Inc. (NYSE:XYZ) with a $90 price target. The analyst’s bullish stance reflects sustained momentum across both the Square and Cash App ecosystems. Despite seasonal trends […]

headline: PayPal's Ecosystem Expansion: Will Partnerships Boost Profitability?
summary: PYPL expands its ecosystem through new partnerships across major platforms to boost seamless commerce.

headline: 2 Small-Cap Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Turn Down
summary: Small-cap stocks can be incredibly lucrative investments because their lack of analyst coverage leads to frequent mispricings. However, these businesses (and their stock prices) often stay small because their subscale operations make it harder to expand their competitive moats.

raw.headline: 2 Small-Cap Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 We Turn Down
raw.summary: Small-cap stocks can be incredibly lucrative investments because their lack of analyst coverage leads to frequent mispricings. However, these businesses (and their stock prices) often stay small because their subscale operations make it harder to expand their competitive moats.

headline: Block (SQ) Valuation Check After Q3 Earnings Miss and Strong Holiday Transaction Growth
summary: Block (SQ) is back in focus after its third quarter earnings miss knocked the stock lower, even as holiday transaction data showed a 10% jump in activity across its ecosystem. See our latest analysis for Block. The third quarter earnings miss has kept a lid on sentiment, and that shows up in the numbers, with the 90 day share price return of minus 13.15% and one year total shareholder return of minus 32.75% pointing to fading momentum despite stronger ecosystem usage. If Block’s recent...
